Woman dies following Feilding Boxing Day incident, police open investigation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-dies-following-feilding-boxing-day-incident-police-open-investigation/LOC774NMEFG4TGYNKFWEFJQVJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-dies-following-feilding-boxing-day-incident-police-open-investigation/LOC774NMEFG4TGYNKFWEFJQVJA/ The woman was transported to Palmerston North and then Wellington hospitals. Sun, 29 Dec 2024 07:51:15 +0000 Police have opened an investigation after a woman died in Wellington Hospital following an incident in Feilding on Boxing Day. Photo / Dean Purcell
Rhythm and thunderstorms: Heavy rain forecast for the North Island; Gisborne set for soaking https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rhythm-and-thunderstorms-heavy-rain-forecast-for-the-north-island-gisborne-set-for-soaking/ZSRTPWC7WNG3RO427OY7DYLLCQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rhythm-and-thunderstorms-heavy-rain-forecast-for-the-north-island-gisborne-set-for-soaking/ZSRTPWC7WNG3RO427OY7DYLLCQ/ David WilliamsThe North Island's central, eastern and southern areas are set to see the worst weather. Sun, 29 Dec 2024 06:00:00 +0000 The hot weather in Auckland is forecast to disappear when thunderstorms roll in for New Year's Eve. Photo / Alex Burton
Missing man in Ōhope was allegedly retrieving fishing net after arrest, family says https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-man-in-ohope-was-allegedly-retriving-fishing-net-after-arrest-family-says/TE6LNRKNDNBIZKMGH3KV6IDPIY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-man-in-ohope-was-allegedly-retriving-fishing-net-after-arrest-family-says/TE6LNRKNDNBIZKMGH3KV6IDPIY/ The family disputes the claim he 'jumped in the water' in order to evade being arrested. Sun, 29 Dec 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Family of a man who died in the waters off Ohope Beach have spoken of what they believe happened in the moments leading up to his death. Photo / NZME
Holiday road toll: Two die in crash on State Highway 1 in Manawatū-Whanganui region, dead and injured include children https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/major-crash-on-state-highway-1-manawatu-whanganui-region-multiple-ambulances-and-helicopters-responding/Q5SKEN2AIRHCXG2NKDUVEM3ESA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/major-crash-on-state-highway-1-manawatu-whanganui-region-multiple-ambulances-and-helicopters-responding/Q5SKEN2AIRHCXG2NKDUVEM3ESA/ Motorists are advised to avoid the area or delay travel. Holiday road toll: Police express disappointment after nine people die during holiday period https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/holiday-road-toll-police-express-disappointment-after-nine-people-die-during-holiday-period/EWWIESP6PVHFXI4IE4Q5NZXXJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/holiday-road-toll-police-express-disappointment-after-nine-people-die-during-holiday-period/EWWIESP6PVHFXI4IE4Q5NZXXJA/ Twenty-one people died in road crashes during the last Christmas period. Sun, 29 Dec 2024 04:40:20 +0000 Police have expressed disappointment with the high holiday road toll after attending eight fatal crashes so far where nine people have died. Photo / Bevan Conley.
The turning-point performance of singer-songwriter Frankie Venter’s career https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/the-turning-point-performance-of-singer-songwriter-frankie-venters-career/OR7PHV4PLBEC3FTV4RHJ7MRCCA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/the-turning-point-performance-of-singer-songwriter-frankie-venters-career/OR7PHV4PLBEC3FTV4RHJ7MRCCA/ Kaitlyn MorrellFrankie Venter's first headline show in Tauranga was the turning point of her career.
